column2: Monmouth Real Estate Investment Corp. operates as a real estate investment trust. The company is headquartered in Holmdel, New Jersey and currently employs 16 full-time employees. The firm's primary business is the ownership of real estate. Its investment focus is to own single tenant, industrial buildings and leased to investment-grade tenants or their subsidiaries on long-term net leases. In addition, the Company owns a portfolio of REIT investment securities. Its assets are situated near airports, transportation hubs and manufacturing plants. The firm's property portfolio consists of approximately 115 properties located across 30 states, containing a total of approximately 22.9 million rentable square feet.
